org.franca.deploymodel.dsl.generator.internal

Class HostLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.deploymodel.dsl.generator.internal.HostLogic

  • public class HostLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines how deployment properties are mapped to Franca IDL objects by the PropertyAccessor generator.

    E.g., each property host implies a defined argument type for the property getter in the accessor. E.g., for the host 'arguments' the Franca type FArgument is used.
